name: Slime Escape
description:
Slime Escape is an intense puzzle game: MrSlime needs your help to find his wife and get out of this mystery dungeon as soon as possible!

Help him flee the dungeon by completing all 30 levels!



Key Features

  • Really Tough Challenges - 30 unique, handcrafted levels!
  • Tight and Juicy - Controls are fine tuned so that it's fun and satisfying to move around!
  • Steam Achivements
